summary: The Department of Defense is the government's largest purchaser and consumer of bulk fuel, which totaled $10.3 billion in FY 2022. DOD purchases fuel in bulk and sells it to a variety of DOD agencies, as well as foreign governments and other federal agencies. This process is complex and includes many different stakeholders and transactions. Consequently, it is important for DOD to document every step...
title: DOD Bulk Fuel: Improved Management over Transactions Could Lead to More Reliable Financial Reporting
